introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is AI Wallpaper Generator
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: AI Wallpaper Generator is the ultimate tool that turns simple prompts into breathtaking desktop and mobile wallpapers with cinematic lighting, crystal clarity, and endless styles. This AI wallpaper generator empowers creators to design stunning visuals in seconds.

items.title: Curated Style Presets
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator offers neon, vaporwave, anime, landscape, and minimalist presets tuned for wallpaper-perfect compositions.

items.title: Smart Prompt Assistant
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator's smart assistant provides guided suggestions to help you describe scenes, lighting, and mood for better wallpaper generation results.

items.title: Optimized for Every Screen
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator exports wallpapers in 4K, ultrawide, and mobile ratios without losing detail or sharpness.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why creators love AI Wallpaper Generator
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: AI Wallpaper Generator provides everything you need to produce on-brand wallpapers, from effortless prompt crafting to share-ready exports. This powerful AI wallpaper generator streamlines your creative workflow.

items.title: Studio-Grade Quality
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator uses fine-tuned diffusion models to deliver crisp lighting, balanced compositions, and natural textures fit for any display.

items.title: Automated Variations
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator lets you generate batches, tweak seeds, and remix colors instantly to keep exploring without repeating manual work.

items.title: Collaborative Collections
items.description: With AI Wallpaper Generator, share boards, vote on favorites, and deliver approved wallpapers to your community or clients in one click.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to create wallpapers with AI Wallpaper Generator
usage.description: AI Wallpaper Generator brings your desktop and mobile screens to life in three simple steps:

items.title: Describe your scene
items.description: Use AI Wallpaper Generator to write a short prompt or remix one of our curated inspirations to set the mood, lighting, and composition.

items.title: Fine-tune the style
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator lets you choose aspect ratios, style presets, seeds, and color palettes while previewing changes in real time.

items.title: Download or share
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator exports crisp 4K wallpapers, schedules auto-refresh for your devices, and shares collections with a public link.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Key features of AI Wallpaper Generator
feature.description: AI Wallpaper Generator helps you design, iterate, and ship breathtaking wallpapers faster than ever. Discover why this AI wallpaper generator is trusted by thousands of creators.

items.title: Prompt Inspiration Library
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator features 200+ curated prompts with tags for mood, theme, and lighting to jump-start your creativity.

items.title: One-click Upscaling
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator upscales to 4K and 8K with enhanced clarity while preserving the original composition.

items.title: Batch Rendering Queue
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator queues up multiple prompts and aspect ratios simultaneously, then reviews results in a unified gallery.

items.title: Adaptive Color Harmony
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator's AI suggests complementary palettes based on your brand or upload a reference for perfect color matching.

items.title: Cloud Collections
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator organizes wallpapers into sharable collections with password protection and download tracking.

items.title: Cross-Device Sync
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator syncs wallpaper rotations across desktop, tablet, and mobile with scheduled updates.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Still curious? Say hi on Discord or email us â€” we reply fast.

items.title: What is AI Wallpaper Generator?
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator is an AI-powered studio for designing high-resolution wallpapers. This advanced AI wallpaper generator lets you describe your idea, choose presets, and download polished results in seconds.

items.title: Can I upload reference images?
items.description: Yes. AI Wallpaper Generator supports reference images. Drop in photos, color swatches, or brand assets and the AI wallpaper generator will match the vibe while keeping your composition balanced.

items.title: Which resolutions do you support?
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator supports 4K, 5K, ultrawide, mobile, and custom ratios. This AI wallpaper generator lets you upscale to 8K anytime without restarting the generation.

items.title: Do I own the wallpapers I generate?
items.description: Absolutely. With AI Wallpaper Generator, every wallpaper you create is yours to use commercially, share with your audience, or sell in your own packs. This AI wallpaper generator gives you full ownership.

items.title: Is there a free trial?
items.description: Yes. AI Wallpaper Generator offers a free trial. Sign up to claim 10 free credits â€” enough to test styles, presets, and the full export workflow of this AI wallpaper generator before upgrading.

items.title: How do credits work?
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator uses a credit system. Each standard render costs one credit. Upscaling, batch queues, and remixing variations use additional credits, all transparently tracked in your AI wallpaper generator dashboard.
